knowledge: Simon Cowell . Simon Phillip Cowell (; born 7 October 1959) is an English reality television judge and producer. He has judged on the British TV talent competition series "Pop Idol", "The X Factor", and "Britain's Got Talent", and the American TV talent competition shows "American Idol", "The X Factor", and "America's Got Talent". Cowell is the principal founder and chief executive of the British entertainment company Syco.
